content:
Can Bookmark folders get sorted automatically so that they appear withing the context of all sorted bookmarks, rather than at the top? (I mean with the context of a bookmarked folder.) But what i want is: Bookmark Bookmark Folder Bookmark Folder (Alpha order assumed.) I want them strictly alpha, regardless of file/folder property, as displayed in 'ls -l'. Having to do this manually is annoying.

title: Restore lost bookmarks?
content:
Because FireFox has been running so slowly, a few minutes ago I chose to Refresh FireFox. The web page said bookmarks and other things would be preserved, but after the refresh FireFox has no bookmarks. I have tried the Restore option under Import and Backups on the Library panel and chose the most recent listing (dated today), but FireFox says "Unable to process the backup file". It also can't process any other, earlier, entry listed.

Is there anything I can do to try to get my bookmarks back, or has FireFox totally hosed me?

Thanks,

Tom Halgren tahalgren@gmail.com

title: Delete/Reset Sync Data
content:

I have seen articles about deleting your account and starting over, but that just seems like a last resort type of option. I am looking for an option that would allow me to choose if I want to use the server side data or use my local settings and overwrite the existing settings on the server. Anyone have any idea on how to do that?

title: I need to hide my email from the right side menu.
content:
Hello, I'm a person who has recently started using the calls on discord more frequently, which means that we like to screenshare the content we're browsing and we want to do that without pressure. It is completely fine when it comes to people I know IRL, they know my name, they know my last name, they know my email, I'm not worried when it comes to them, but, if I'm sharing Firefox, I always have to remember that I should stop sharing before clicking those three lines for the right side menu, before I accidentally show my email, which contains my real name.

Is there any option to protect me? To hide the email, or the entire option, or just for it to say something like "My account"?

If the feature does exist, please let me know! And if it doesn't, I'd like to have it for a future update.

Thanks in advance.

title: Screen corruption when browsing eBay, again.
content:
Hello,

Having a strange problem with Firefox that I have not been able to pin down. Seems to only happen when browsing eBay. The issues appears frequently but randomly. May occur immediately or after an hour of browsing. I have updated drives with no change. I have tried disabling hardware acceleration and while that did seem to help the performance hit was unacceptable. This is a very basic i7 with Intel HD graphics so nothing sophisticated. Screen captures are attached. The screen will completely corrupt then fix itself in a few seconds to minutes. A few versions back I used to see black lines on eBay pages but that has been cleared up for a while. Now it is this. I have refreshed Firefox, done a complete uninstall/reinstall, cleared all cache and browser history and tested other browsers. Issue seems to follow Firefox.

title: CTRL key loses focus in input field preventing short cuts like CTRL+C or CTRL+A on DuckDuckGo
content:
On duckduckgo.com with Firefox 83.0 (64-bit) (Ubuntu 18.04 LTS), when I try to use short cuts CTRL+C or CTRL+A within the search field, I lose focus and whole text on the website is selected instead of the search field.

I tried a few things like using clean profile, which didn't lead to any solution. I tried other websites, where I didn't have any problem. Other keys (SHIFT, ALT) don't cause the same issue.

I tried to click only CTRL, which caused the issue.

Finally, with a hunch, I disabled the CTRL pointer location in GNOME Tweaks and the problem was gone. Somehow, something about duckduckgo.com with pointer location, focus is lost. I didn't that shouldn't happen and potentially more websites are affected by this.

Is this a bug? Or is there a problem on duckduckgo.com side?
creator: sarentasciyan

title: Bookmarks Missing After Laptop Sent in for Repair
content:

Please let me know if there's anything I can do to recover my BMs.

Thanks.
